naslov: LUKSUZNA VILA S BAZENOM, SPORTSKIM TERENIMA: Štokovci, 294.00 m2 (prodaja)
opis: NA PRODAJU – LUKSUZNA VILA S BAZENOM, SPORTSKIM TERENIMA I POGLEDOM NA MORE – ISTRA Cijena: 650.000 EUR (prodaja tvrtke vlasnika, značajna ušteda na porezu!) Prodaje se ekskluzivna vila smještena na ulazu u pitoreskno selo Štokovci (druga kuća s desne strane uz prometni znak), svega 50 m od asfaltirane prometnice Bijažići–Štokovci. Objekt je izgrađen na ograđenom zemljištu površine 2000 m², sa suhozidom visine 1,5 – 2 m. UKUPNA POVRŠINA VILE: 294 m² Kvalitetna gradnja, izvrsna izolacija (10 cm grafitni stiropor), trostruka PVC stolarija s Low-e staklom ispunjena plinom, energetski razred A+, sustav centralnog grijanja (izvedena 1. faza), klima uređaji u svim sobama, Internet, alarmni sustav i video nadzor. SADRŽAJ NEKRETNINE PODRUM: Multifunkcionalni prostor – idealan za fitness ili rekreaciju Kotlovnica PRIZEMLJE: 1 spavaća soba s kupaonicom (cca 26 m²) Prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom (cca 55 m²) Kupaonica za goste Prostor za perilicu i sušilicu Natkrivena terasa (36 m²) s pogledom na bazen i kamin PRVI KAT: 3 spavaće sobe s vlastitim kupaonicama (22 m², 26 m² i 25 m²) Jedna soba s balkonom (7 m²) i pogledom na more Svi prostori klimatizirani, sa SAT/TV prijemnicima EKSTERIJER: Grijani bazen (36 m²) s prostranom sunčalištem (100 m²) Natkriveni roštilj s blagovaonskim stolom (20 m²) Parking: Natkriven za 2 automobila + dodatni prostor za još 2 (ukupno cca 100 m²) Hidromasažna kada (2,15 x 2,15 m, za 5+1 osoba, natkrivena) Multifunkcionalni teren (16 x 8 m): mali nogomet, košarka, odbojka Mini golf (6 rupa) Dječje igralište s ljuljačkom, toboganom, penjalicom i dr. Navodnjavanje travnjaka, mali šumarak s odmorištem za ljetne dane DODATNE PREDNOSTI: Prodajom tvrtke kupac štedi cca 16.500 EUR na porezu na promet nekretnina (plaća se samo na zemljište) Bez dodatnih troškova prijepisa i kategorizacije Objekat je idealan za osobno korištenje, ali i za turistički najam Vlasništvo uredno Cijena uključuje i zemljište! --- FOR SALE – LUXURY VILLA WITH POOL, SPORTS COURTS AND SEA VIEW – ISTRIA Price: EUR 650,000 (sale of the owner's company, significant tax savings!) Exclusive villa for sale located at the entrance to the picturesque village of Štokovci (second house on the right by the traffic sign), only 50 m from the paved road Bijažići–Štokovci. The property is built on a fenced plot of land of 2000 m², with drywall 1.5 – 2 m high. TOTAL AREA OF THE VILLA: 294 m² Quality construction, excellent insulation (10 cm graphite polystyrene), triple PVC joinery with Low-e glass filled with gas, energy class A+, central heating system (phase 1 completed), air conditioners in all rooms, Internet, alarm system and video surveillance. PROPERTY CONTENT BASEMENT: Multifunctional space - ideal for fitness or recreation Boiler room GROUND FLOOR: 1 bedroom with bathroom (approx. 26 m²) Spacious living room with kitchen and dining area (approx. 55 m²) Guest bathroom Space for washing machine and dryer Covered terrace (36 m²) with pool view and fireplace FIRST FLOOR: 3 bedrooms with private bathrooms (22 m², 26 m² and 25 m²) One room with balcony (7 m²) and sea view All areas air-conditioned, with SAT/TV receivers EXTERIOR: Heated swimming pool (36 m²) with spacious sunbathing area (100 m²) Covered barbecue with dining table (20 m²) Parking: Covered for 2 cars + additional space for 2 more (total approx. 100 m²) Hot tub (2.15 x 2.15 m, for 5+1 people, covered) Multifunctional field (16 x 8 m): five-a-side football, basketball, volleyball Mini golf (6 holes) Children's playground with swings, slide, climbing frame, etc. Lawn irrigation, small grove with a resting place for summer days ADDITIONAL ADVANTAGES: By selling the company, the buyer saves approximately EUR 16,500 on real estate tax (paid only on the land) No additional costs for transcription and categorization The facility is ideal for personal use, but also for tourist rental Ownership in order The price includes the land!
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
